description: GPS utilities is a collection of GPS applications for your phone.  Waypoints: allows you to enter in a latitude and longitude and navigate to it later.  Find Food: find types of food near you.  Find Me: get information (including address) about your current location.  Track Me: track your current speed and location, log it off and email the log if desired.  Find Nearby: search nearby for anything you can think of.  Save My Spot: save your current location and bring it up on a map later on.
